00036 const char *CommandTryLock::ms_usage[] = {
00037   "trylock <file> <mode>",
00038   "  This command issues a TRYLOCK request to Hyperspace.  The <mode> argument",
00039   "  may be either SHARED or EXCLUSIVE.",
00040   (const char *)0
00041 };
00042 
00043 int CommandTryLock::run() {
00044   uint64_t handle;
00045   int error;
00046   uint32_t mode = 0;
00047   struct LockSequencer lockseq;
00048   uint32_t status;
00049 
00050   if (m_args.size() != 2) {
00051     cerr << "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00052     return -1;
00053   }
00054 
00055   if (m_args[0].second != "" || m_args[1].second != "") {
00056     cerr << "Invalid character '=' in argument." << endl;
00057     return -1;
00058   }
00059 
00060   if (m_args[1].first == "SHARED")
00061     mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00062   else if (m_args[1].first == "EXCLUSIVE")
00063     mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00064   else {
00065     cerr << "Invalid mode value (" << m_args[1].second << ")" << endl;
00066     return -1;
00067   }
00068 
00069   if (!Util::get_handle(m_args[0].first, &handle))
00070     return -1;
00071 
00072   if ((error = m_session->try_lock(handle, mode, &status, &lockseq)) == Error::OK) {
00073     if (status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED)
00074       cout << "SEQUENCER name=" << lockseq.name << " mode=" << lockseq.mode << " generation=" << lockseq.generation << endl << flush;
00075     else if (status == LOCK_STATUS_BUSY)
00076       cout << "busy" << endl;
00077     else
00078       cout << "Unknown status: " << status << endl;
00079   }
00080 
00081 
00082   return error;
00083 }
